title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Language Learning Design Based on E-Learning 2.0 Ecosystem Model

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze E-Learning 2.0 ecosystem components (content, community, tools) and apply them to instructional design.
Learners can design and execute collaborative learning scenarios in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can build a formative assessment feedback system to improve the E-Learning 2.0 ecosystem model based on learning outcome data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
